page.title: 08GRAVEL PITS
page.content: THE ONLY NON-FARMING INDUSTRY IN THIS AREA IS THE GRAVEL PITS. THESE PITS COVER AN AREA OF ABOUT HALF A SQUARE KILOMETRE,AND ALTHOUGH EFFORTS HAVE BEEN MADE TO DISGUISE THEM WITH RAISED PERIMETERS AND TREE PLANTING,THEY ARE STILL A NOTABLE FEATURE OF THE LANDSCAPE. OPEN FOR ABOUT 15 YEARS,THEY DESCEND 20 METRES INTO THE EARTH,AND HAVE ENOUGH SAND AND GRAVEL IN THEM TO LAST ANOTHER 12 YEARS. THE SAND AND GRAVEL IS EXCAVATED AT A RATE OF ABOUT 60 TONS AN HOUR. THE PRODUCT IS USED BY THE LOCAL BUILDING INDUSTRY, ALTHOUGH MUCH TOP SOIL HAS BEEN USED TO STRENGTHEN THE NEARBYE RIVER BANK. ONLY 7 PEOPLE WORK AT THE GRAVEL PIT: 5 WORKERS,1 MANAGER AND1 SECRETARY.
